trans-unit.source: Container for all dialog-editing logic for <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.PropertyEntry*> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contêiner para toda a lógica de edição de caixa de diálogo para <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.PropertyEntry*>objetos.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.PropertyEntry*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DialogPropertyValueEditor class to show an inline editor that can have an associated dialog box editor.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe DialogPropertyValueEditor para mostrar um embutido editor que pode ter um editor de caixa de diálogo associada.

trans-unit.source: The DialogPropertyValueEditor class can hold either a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for a dialog box editor or custom logic that is called when the dialog box is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A classe DialogPropertyValueEditor pode conter um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para um editor de caixa de diálogo ou lógica personalizada que é chamada quando a caixa de diálogo é invocada.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> in your <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to invoke your custom DialogPropertyValueEditor class.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>seu <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para chamar sua classe DialogPropertyValueEditor personalizado</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>

trans-unit.source: You can provide a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> which is shown in a host dialog box, or you can override the <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> method, which enables the reuse of existing or system dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fornecer um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>que é mostrada na caixa de diálogo de host, ou você pode substituir o <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>método, que permite a reutilização das caixas de diálogo existente ou system.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the rules for determining whether the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> or <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> method is used.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as regras para determinar se o <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>ou <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>método é usado.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A> property is not a [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> is hosted in a host-specific dialog box, which provides host styling.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>propriedade não é um [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] referência (Nothing no Visual Basic), que <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>é hospedado em uma caixa de diálogo de host específico que fornece o host de estilo.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> is not called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>não for chamado.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A> property is a [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the virtual <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> method is called and you can override this method to show any dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>propriedade é um [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] referência (Nothing no Visual Basic), virtual <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>método é chamado e você pode substituir este método para mostrar qualquer caixa de diálogo.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor"></xref> class with no specific templates.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor"> </xref> classe sem modelos específicos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor> class with the specified dialog editor and inline editor templates.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor>classe com o editor de caixa de diálogo especificada e modelos de editor embutido.</xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Window.DataTemplate> that is hosted in a host-specific dialog chrome and has its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> set to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> that corresponds to the property being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Window.DataTemplate>que é hospedado no chrome caixa de diálogo de host específico e tem seu <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*>definido como o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> que corresponde à propriedade que está sendo editada.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> </xref:System.Window.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used for the inline editor user interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> que é usado para a interface de usuário do editor embutido.

trans-unit.source: If used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> is set to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> that corresponds to the property being edited.
trans-unit.target: Se usado, sua <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*>é definido como o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> que corresponde à propriedade que está sendo editada.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is hosted by a host-specific dialog and has its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> que é hospedado por uma caixa de diálogo de host específico e tem seu <> </> *> definido como um <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `null`, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.ShowDialog%2A> method is called instead.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade retorna `null`, o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.ShowDialog%2A>método é chamado em vez disso.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> object that is hosted by a host-specific dialog.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> objeto que é hospedado por uma caixa de diálogo específica do host.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate*> is null and a dialog has been invoked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate*>é nula e uma caixa de diálogo foi chamada pelo usuário.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Since the commands get handled by the host and since custom dialogs are not going to be part of that visual tree, the `commandSource` exposes an <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> that is part of the host's visual tree and that, therefore, can be used to execute property editing commands in such a way that they are handled correctly.
trans-unit.target: Como os comandos são manipulados pelo host e, como caixas de diálogo personalizadas não for parte da árvore visual, o `commandSource` expõe um <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>que faz parte da árvore visual do host e, portanto, pode ser usado para executar comandos de forma que eles são tratados corretamente de edição de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method enables you to implement any custom dialog logic, such as invoking existing system dialogs.
trans-unit.target: Substituir esse método permite que você implementar qualquer lógica de diálogo personalizadas, como chamar caixas de diálogo de sistema existente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*> for the property being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*>para a propriedade que está sendo editada.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.IinputElement> that can be used as a source for execution of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditorCommands"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.IinputElement>que pode ser usado como uma fonte para execução de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditorCommands"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.IinputElement>
